title: Kovářova chalupa
content:
Kovářova chalupa is not just a home but also a place of business. It is located at the southern end of the village of Bahnice. There you can find the kovář himself, and his family, which includes his žena and syn. The house faces Adam's and Alina's homes.

Úkoly
Pokušitelka
V poledním žáru
Zbroj
